questions.question: Which of the following best defines a simple pendulum?

answers.a: A rigid body swinging about a fixed axis
answers.b: A point mass suspended from a fixed point by a massless string
answers.c: A rigid rod swinging about its center of mass
answers.d: A solid sphere rotating about its center

questions.question: What is the formula for the period (T) of a simple pendulum for small angles?
The mass moment of inertia for a simple pendulum is given by which of the following formulas?
What does the parallel axis theorem allow you to calculate?

answers.a: The center of mass of a pendulum
answers.b: The moment of inertia about any axis parallel to the center of mass axis
answers.d: The velocity of the pendulum bob at equilibrium

questions.question: Which of the following is true for a compound pendulum?

answers.a: It has a massless string and a point mass
answers.b: The period is independent of the mass distribution
answers.c: The mass is distributed along its length
answers.d: It only follows simple harmonic motion for large angles
